summary: One hundred years of Hindi cinema is celebrated in four short stories showcasing the power of film.
cast: Rani Mukerji|Randeep Hooda|Saqib Saleem|Nawazuddin Siddiqui|Sadashiv Amrapurkar|Naman Jain|Ranvir Shorey|Amitabh Bachchan|Katrina Kaif|Farhan Akhtar|Abdul Quadir Amin|Vidya Balan|Juhi Chawla|Priyanka Chopra|Swati Das|Pravina Bhagwat Deshpande|Madhuri Dixit|Khushi Dubey|Lavin Gothi|Sarah Hashmi|Naman Jain|Anil Kapoor|Kareena Kapoor|Karisma Kapoor|Ranbir Kapoor|Shahid Kapoor|Aamir Khan|Imran Khan|Saif Ali Khan|Shah Rukh Khan|Kartik Krishnan|Nishant Kumar|Viineet Kumar|Diana Penty|Ayushmaan Saxena|Ranveer Singh|Sridevi|Natasha Tendulkar
director: Directors: Zoya Akhtar, Dibakar Banerjee | 2 more credits Â»
title: Bombay Talkies
